title: Amazing opportunity a 1 Bedroom, 1/ 1 Bath with office/den unit
description: Unique contemporary NYC-style loft condominium in historic Bancroft Mills! A dramatic, welcoming and one-of-a-kind address. Amazing opportunity a 1 Bedroom, 1/ 1 Bath with office/den unit in this former cotton mill overlooking the Brandywine River and Alapocas State Park. The renovations create a modern space while highlighting the stunning architectural details still present from the days the building served as a nineteenth century cotton textile mill. With high ceilings with exposed beams, walls of windows with spectacular view of the Brandywine Creek and an open floor plan, Kitchen has granite counter tops and stainless appliances with a large bar meals or entertaining opening into the great room which features two oversized windows with deep sills and stunning views of picturesque Brandywine River. Bedroom has en-suite full bath. Additional features include powder room, office/den with pass thru to kitchen, updated HVAC & water heater, newer PVC pipes, & fresh paint. Just a short walk to Rockford Park, Delaware Art Museum, and Trolley Square, for hiking, biking and exploring just out your front door. In 1984 Bancroft Mills earned the designation on the National Register of Historic Buildings and in 1992 was restored and adapted to house 46 condominium units.

description: Welcome to this extremely charming 2 bedroom, 1 full bath bungalow home located on an excellent street with perfect curb appeal.
